conclusion: Determine the power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched.
Calculate the Lorentz force F using F = I * L * B, resulting in F = 5 N.
Calculate the acceleration a using a = F/m, resulting in a = 250 m/s^2.
Calculate the final velocity v using v^2 = u^2 + 2aL, resulting in v = 15.81 m/s.
Calculate the kinetic energy KE using KE = 1/2 * m * v^2, resulting in KE = 2.5 J.
Calculate the time t using t = v/a, resulting in t = 0.06324 s.
Calculate the power P using P = KE/t, resulting in P = 39.54 W.
The power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched is approximately 39.54 W.
